parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: It is a care, it is an object of anxiety, it concerns. A primary verb; to be of interest to, i.e. To concern.
From the base of peran; properly, through, i.e. Around; figuratively with respect to; used in various applications, of place, cause or time.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Poor, destitute, spiritually poor, either in a good sense (humble devout persons) or bad.
But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
A thief. From klepto; a stealer.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From glossa and the base of kosmos; properly, a case i.e. a casket or purse.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Perhaps remotely derived from the base of basis; to lift, literally or figuratively.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Accusative Neuter Plural
str2: (a) I cast, throw, rush, (b) often, in the weaker sense: I place, put, drop. A primary verb; to throw.
